abstract: Pittsburgh Pirates and player John Jaso sign two-year, $8 million contract; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: John Jaso and the Pittsburgh Pirates agreed on a two-year, $8 million contract.

headline.main: Pirates Sign Jaso to Play First Base
headline.print_headline: Pirates Sign Jaso to Play First Base

snippet: John Jaso and the Pittsburgh Pirates agreed on a two-year, $8 million contract.
